column1: Baby Barnaby's////My co-workers and I came to Baby Barnaby's Cafe one morning after work. Baby Barnaby's can have a long wait on weekend mornings
column2: so we were lucky to get there right when the restaurant opened. They offer a small menu
column3: but it includes a wide range of breakfast items. I ordered the Smoked Salmon plate and WOW. Not only was it huge
column4: it was delicious! It definitely hit the spot after a long night at work and I even had leftovers to take home for later. Looking at my co-workers' meals
column5: all the proportions are huge. I sampled everyone's meals and everything tasted fabulous. The place is quite small on the inside
column6: so if you'd prefer more room
column7: snag a table on their enclosed patio. Another great place to add to my list of favorite brunch spots!
